loans.name: Clementine

texts.en: Clementine is 33 years old. She is married with two children who are 1 and 3 years old. They do not yet go to school. She has a shop and has been running her business for the past two years. With the loan, she would like to buy more items such as rice and beans to sell. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy more items such as rice and beans to sell.

loans.name: Solange

texts.en: Solange is 39 years old. She is married with four children between the ages of 6 and 17. All of them go to school. She sells foodstuffs and has also been selling clothes for the past five years. With the loan, she would like to buy more sorghum and beans to sell. She will reinvest the profits in order to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum and beans to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new fishing boat, fishing nets, lead weights and hooks

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en:
Gayane lives in Gyumri town, where she lives with her brother and brother's family (wife and six-year-old child).
 
She and her brother have been involved in a retail business for 15 years already. They sell fruits and vegetables in the central wholesale market. Using their own truck, which they bought last summer, they are transporting fruits and vegetables to nearby communities and selling.
 
The requested loan is very important for Gayane and her brother to be able to purchase new stocks of fruits and vegetables for reselling. Gayane has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business startup loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

Please help Gayane's loan to be funded and support their retail business.

loans.use: to pay for new stock of fruits and vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is 24 years old. She is married with 2 children aged between 3 and 1 who do not yet go to school. 

Christine has a shop and has been running this business for the past 8 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more items such as rice, sugar, biscuits and salt to sell in her shop. 

The profits from the business will be used to reinvest, and for the welfare of her family.

loans.use: To buy more items such as rice, sugar, biscuits and salt to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Sidnooma Group

texts.fr:
Mme RASMATA représente le groupe SIDNOOMA. Elle se porte très bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 12ans et le moins âgé a 14mois. 01 va à l’école.
Mme vend des céréales  depuis 08ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les provinces environnantes. 
Elle veut s’acheter 03 sacs  de mil et 03 sacs d’haricot.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut épargner. Mme ambitionne  agrandir son champ d’activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille
texts.en:
Rasmata represents the Sidnooma Group.  She is doing very well.  She is married and has three children, the eldest is twelve years old, and the youngest is fourteen months old.  One of her children currently attends school.

Rasmata has been selling cereals for eight years now.  She buys her supplies in the local surrounding area.  Her loan will be used to buy three sacks of millet and three sacks of beans.

Rasmata plans to save the profits that she makes.  In the future, she would like to expand her business and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy 3 sacks of millet and 3 sacks of beans for resale.

loans.name: Dame

texts.fr:
Dame, est un jeune qui s’active dans le domaine du commerce. Il a démarré son activité en 1999 et s’était installé dans la capitale. Il a ensuite déménagé dans une autre ville depuis 2007 où il continue son commerce. Il a ouvert une cantine de vente de denrées alimentaires.
Dame est marié, mais n’a pas encore d’enfant ; il paie la location de sa boutique et s’occupe de sa femme. Dame est un habitué de l’IMCEC, il est à son 4ème crédit et les services offert par cette dernière lui permettent de diversifier les produits et services mais aussi de construire petit à petit sa maison.
Il aimerait développer davantage son commerce dans l’avenir parce qu’il ne connait que cela.
texts.en:
Dame is a young man who works in commerce.  He began working in 1999, in the capital city, but in 2007 he moved to another town to continue his business.  Dame runs a sales stall, selling food products.

Dame is married and has no children yet.  He is responsible for paying the rent for his sales stall and taking care of his wife.

Dame has been working with the field partner, UIMCEC, for some time now, this will be his fourth loan.  The support that he has received from UIMCEC has enabled him to diversify the range of products that he offers, and, over time, to construct a house.  Dame would like to expand his business further in the future as this is the only business that he knows.

loans.use: to buy food products including rice, sugar, soap and oil, for resale.

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es:
José de 40 años de edad es jornalero, tiene dos hijos de 10 y 13 años de edad. Él solamente estudio primer grado, su pareja trabaja en los oficios domesticos.

José trabaja con ganando lo ha hecho por mas de 20 años, lo aprendio de su padre, tambien trabaja la agricultura.

El préstamo lo invertira para comprar una vaca de repasto.  Sus sueños son que sus hijos estudien y se preparen academicamente. El préstamo le ayudara mucho porque puede comprar de una vez y asi incrementar su ganado y con las ganancias ira pagando las cuotas del crédito.
texts.en:
Jose is 40 years old, he is a day laborer, he has two children of 10 and 13 years old. He only studied up to first grade, his partner does the household chores.

Jose works with cattle, which he has done for 20 years, he learnt this trade from his father, he also works in agriculture.

The loan will be used to buy a cow to graze. His dreams are that his children go school and prepare themselves academically. The loan will help very much because he will be able to buy it all at once and thus he will increase his profits and with his earnings make the payments on the loan.

loans.use: to buy a cow to graze.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.en:
Oscar is an artisan from Peru who specializes in leather home accents. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including wood and leather.

Oscar has been selling through Novica since 2004. This is his story:

"When I was 10 years old my father died, leaving me no choice but to work at different jobs. One day, when I was 12, I came upon a carpentry shop where I discovered my vocation for working with wood and leather. I resolved to master the craft, and I did so on my own, learning each step and improving every detail. Now I have my own workshop. My work is what sustains my family, and it excites me. It fulfills me. And so each day I renew and perfect my designs so that, through them, I will be recognized as an artisan."

"I am very grateful for this microfinance loan. I would like each of you to know that I always strive to make a product of the very best quality. I pour my heart and soul into each piece in order to ensure the total satisfaction of my customers and faithfully represent the great art of my country, Peru."

Use the link below to view Oscar's leather home accents on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/4344

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials, including wood and leather

loans.name: Buana

texts.en:
Buana is an Indonesian artisan who specializes in handmade jewelry. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of silver and gemstones for his designs.

Buana has been selling through Novica since 2006. This is his story:

"I've been surrounded by handicrafts all my life. I am thankful to God for giving me such a great gift so I can make a living for my family. Not much, perhaps, but enough for our simple way of life."

"I want to thank those who keep supporting me. I want to give the best I can through my work. This microfinance loan will go toward purchasing the materials I need to prepare for the holiday season. Thank you for your endless support and for making this microfinance loan possible."

Use the link below to view Buana's handmade jewelry on the Novica site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/5503

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of silver and gemstones for his designs

loans.name: Massamba

texts.fr:
Monsieur Massamba, âgé de 32 ans, fait du commerce et a acquis une expérience de plus de 5 ans. Il est marié et n’a pas encore d’enfant. Massamba fait du commerce de divers compte tenu la période. Comme actuellement, il sollicite ce crédit pour effectuer une opération Tabaski. Il va acheter des moutons, les engraisser un peu pour les revendre. 
Massamba vit en famille avec ses frères et ils s’occupent ensemble de la dépense quotidienne de la famille.
Comme projet d’avenir, monsieur Massamba, veut un jour diversifier son activité ; voyager pour acheter de la marchandise et venir revendre au pays. Il aimerait aussi construire sa maison un jour.
texts.en:
Massamba is 32 years old and has been working in commerce for more than five years.  He is married but has no children yet.  Massamba is involved in various money generating initiatives.  He has requested this loan now in order to prepare for the Tabaski festival.  He intends to buy sheep, rear them and then resell them.

Massamba lives with his brothers and between them, they provide for the day-to-day expenses of their family.  In the future, Massamba would like to further diversify his activities and travel in order to buy products to then be sold in his country.  He would also like to build a house one day.

loans.use: to buy sheep to be reared and sold on.

loans.name: Addemir Alfredo

texts.es:
Addemir es un joven talentoso, de 22 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Pachacutec junto a su familia.
Desde hace más de 2 años trabaja como obrero de campo, porque quiere apoyar a su familia. Por algunas situaciones económicas no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero eso no es un impedimento para que pueda salir adelante. Todos los días se despierta con la motivación de sacar adelante a su familia.
Addemir está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá realizar mejoras de su vivienda, como reforzar y pintarrajear las paredes, con esto estará mejorando su calidad de vida. Así su familia estará más cómoda y segura, con esta tranquilidad Addemir seguirá luchando para más adelante poder construir su casa propia.
texts.en:
Addemir, 22, is a talented young man who is single and lives in Pachacutec with his family.  For over two years he has been a farm worker because he wants to support his family.  Because of certain economic situations he was unable to study for a professional career but that has not been an impediment for getting ahead.  Every day he awakes with the motivation to help his family.

Addemir is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support he will be able to carry out home improvements such as as reinforcing and painting the walls.  This will improve his quality of life and his family will be more comfortable and safer, which will give Addemir the peach of mind to continue striving toward his goal of building his own house.

loans.use: To reinforce and paint the walls of her house.

loans.name: Darvin Jose

texts.es: DARVIN NACIÓ EN LA COMUNIDAD DE EL SARDINAL EN EL AÑO 1985. ESTUDIÓ LA ESCUELA PRIMARIA PERO SOLO LLEGÓ HASTA QUINTO GRADO. POSTERIORMENTE SE DEDICÓ A TRABAJAR CON SU PADRE EN AGRICULTURA. PERO DARVIN DECIDIÓ QUE QUERÍA CONTINUAR CON SUS ESTUDIOS POR LO QUE SE MUDÓ AL MUNICIPIO DEL CUÁ DONDE ESTUDIÓ EL PRIMER AÑO DE SECUNDARIA Y LUEGO SE MUDÓ NUEVAMENTE A LA COMUNIDAD DEL SARDINAL. ACTUALMENTE DARVIN ESTA ACOMPAÑADO Y TIENE DOS HIJOS, UN HIJO DE 9 AÑOS Y UNA HIJA DE 3 AÑOS, SU HIJO MAYOR YA ASISTE A LA ESCUELA Y DARVIN QUIERE SIEMPRE APOYAR A SU HIJO. EN LA COMUNIDAD DONDE VIVE DARVIN Y SU FAMILIA NO EXISTE LA ENERGÍA ELECTRICA, ES POR ESO QUE DARVIN DECIDIÓ OBTENER UN SISTEMA SOLAR PEQUEÑO, PERO HOY EL QUIERE AÑADIR UN PANEL SOLAR A SU SISTEMA PARA PODER TENER MAS BOMBILLOS EN SU CASA. Y ESA ES LA RAZÓN POR LA CUAL EL ESTA APLICANDO A OBTENER UN CREDITO.
texts.en:
Darvin was born in the community of El Sardinal in 1985.  He attended primary school but only made it to fifth grade.  Later he worked with his father in farming but then decided he wanted to continue his education.  He moved to the municipality where he studied first year of secondary school and then moved back to El Sardinal.  

Currently, Darvin has a common-law partner and two children: a son nine years old and a daughter who is three.  His eldest attends schoold and Darvin wants to support him.  The community where Darvin and his family live does not have electric energy.  Therefore, Darvin has decided to buy a small solar system.  He wants to add a solar panel to his system in order to have more lightbulbs at home.  This is why he is requesting the loan.

loans.use: To buy a solar panel.

loans.name: Maguette

texts.fr:
La dame Maguette, âgée de 37 ans, s’active dans le commerce depuis plus de 5 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont son ainé âgé de 15 ans et le cadet, de 4 ans. Maguette sollicite un crédit pour acheter des chaussures, des draps de lit et de l’encens pour revendre. Elle est active de 8h à 13h et de 15h à 19h et fait l’ambulant. Elle compte sa clientèle parmi ses voisins, ses amis et ses proches parents.
 Maguette appuie son mari, dans les charges de la maison et s’occupe aussi de ses propres dépenses personnelles.
Elle veut améliorer son commerce et devenir autonome un jour pour ne plus avoir à emprunter.
texts.en:
Maguette is 37 years old and has been working in commerce for more than five years.  She is married and has four children.  The eldest child is fifteen years old, and the youngest is four years old.  Maguette has requested this loan in order to buy shoes, bed sheets and incense for resale.  She works from eight in the morning until one, and between three and seven in the afternoon.  She sells her products on foot to her neighbours, friends and family.

Maguette helps her husband to provide for the expenses of their household, and is responsible for her own personal expenses.  She would like to improve her business in the future and become independent enough to no longer need the help of loans.

loans.use: to buy bed sheets, shoes and incense for resale.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose tiene 46 años, conviviente, es muy conocido en el medio, por la labor de crianza y venta de animales menores. Vive en casa alquilada, con su conyuge y 02 hijos de 05 y 08 años respectivamente. Él cuenta con buenas referencias económicas y familiares. Vive en una comunidad habitada por gente respetuosa, que se dedicadan al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia; ubicada en el distrito de Lagunas, provincia de Chiclayo, costa norte de Perú.

Jose se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como patos, pavos y cuyes, desde hace más de 06 años aproximadamente, adicionalmente trabaja como jornalero en construcción y en agricultura. Él necesita préstamo para invertir en compra de animales y comida para estos, lo que le generará mayor ventas e ingresos a su unidad familiar.
texts.en:
Jose, 46, has a common-law partner and is very well-known for his work raising and selling small animals.  He lives in a rented home with his wife and two children, ages five and eight.  He says he has good credit and family records.  He lives in a community with respectful people who work in commerce, agriculture and livestock farming.  It is located in the district of Lagunas, province of Chiclayo along the northern coast of Peru.

Jose raises and sells small animals such as ducks, turkeys and guinea pigs.  He has been in business for over six years.  He also works as a day laborer in construction and agriculture.  He is in need of a loan to buy animals and animal feed in order to generate more sales and income for his family.

loans.use: To buy animals and animal feed.

loans.name: Duterintambwe I Group

texts.fr:
Christophe  fait partie du groupe  Duterintambwe et  habite à  Gitega. Il a 29 ans et est marié à Evelyne,une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 2 enfants âgés de 1 à 3ans.Il fait le commerce de bois de chauffages  depuis  4 ans. 

Il est à son huitième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de bois de chauffage, à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  avoir une boutique ,et voir se enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Christophe is a member of the Duterintambwe Group, and lives in Gitega.  He is 29 years old and married to Evelyne who works as a farmer.  Together, they have two children, aged three years and one year.  Christophe has been selling firewood for four years.  This will be his eighth loan with the field partner, Turame.  He plans to use his loan to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of firewood for resale.

In the coming years, he would like to open a shop and see his children attend school.

loans.use: to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of firewood for resale.

loans.name: G.s. Miraflores Del Profundo Group

texts.es: Juan Ángel, tiene 50 años de edad vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien  tiene 2 hijos, y reside  en el municipio de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. Se dedica al cultivo de café desde hace 15 años, realiza el cultivo en su propiedad. La producción la vende en grano húmedo en pastilla en el mercado local. Anteriormente cultivaba solo maíz y frijoles. el préstamo es en forma grupal y solicita 5,000 lempiras para  la compra de fertilizantes y limpieza para la finca de café y poder mejorar las condiciones del cultivo.  Su plan es seguir  cultivado café. El  grupo se llama Miraflores del profundo, integrado por 7 personas, que se dedican a la agricultura y viven en la misma comunidad. El préstamo grupal es por 35,000 lempiras para dar asistencia al cultivo de café. En la foto se identifican así: Javier, Juan José, Jervin y Juan Ángel a la derecha. Las mujeres a la izquierda esta Santos, Maira y Gloria a la derecha.
texts.en:
Juan Ángel, 50, lives with his wife and two children in the municipality of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara.  For 15 years he has been working in coffee production on his own plantation.  He sells his coffee bean production at the local market.  He used to grow corn and beans.

The loan in the amount of 5,000 HNL is part of a group loan and will be used to buy fertilizers and clean Juan Ángel's coffee plantation so he can improve crop conditions.  His plan is to continue growing coffee.  The Miraflores del Profundo Group consists of seven members who work in agriculture in the same community.  The group loan is for 35,000 HNL for coffee production.  In the photo appear Javier, Juan José, Jervin and Juan Ángel on the right.  From the left the women are Santos, Maira and Gloria on the right.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and clean his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Badeya Group

texts.fr:
Mme SOLANGE représente le groupe BADEYA. Elle se porte bien avec son bébé. Mariée, elle est mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 19ans et le moins âgé a 14mois. Les 03 vont à l’école.
Mme fait la restauration (vente d’atiéké) depuis 11ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son quartier. 
Elle veut s’acheter 03sachets d’atiéké (couscous de manioc), ½  carton de poissons frais et une douzaine de gobelets et de plats pour sa restauration.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle désire épargner. Mme ambitionne étendre les limites de son activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Solange represents the Badeya Group.  She is doing very well with her baby.  Solange is married and has four children.  The eldest is nineteen years old and the youngest is fourteen months old.  Three of her children currently attend school.  

Solange has been running a restaurant business for eleven years, she sells atiéké (cassava couscous).  She buys her suppplies at her local market.  Her loan will be used to buy three sachets of atiéké, half a box of fresh fish and a dozen cups and plates for her restaurant business.  She plans to save her profits.  In the future, Solange would like to extend the limits of her business and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy 3 sachets of atiéké (cassava couscous), ½  a box of fresh fish and a dozen cups and plates for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Fatoumata

texts.fr:
Madame Fatoumata, une veuve remariée, s’active dans l’élevage de poulets de chair, activité qu’elle a démarrée il y a juste 3 ans de cela. Elle n’a pas d’enfants avec son nouveau mari, mais sinon avec son mari décédé. C’est d’ailleurs son fils ainé qui fait l’activité ; elle sollicite le crédit de 300 000F qu’elle va lui remettre pour l’achat de poussins et d’aliments volaille. Elle n’a pas de charges particulières et les bénéfices tirés de l’activité sont épargnés car elle veut acheter un congélateur pour abattre les sujets à terme et les conserver dans le but de minimiser les charges d’exploitation.
Elle veut augmenter le nombre de sujets et maximiser le profit pour améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille.
texts.en:
Fatoumata, a widow who has remarried, has been raising chickens for three years.  She has no children with her new husband but did have children with her previous husband.  Her eldest son works with her.  She has requested this loan of 300,000 francs CFA which she will give to her son to buy chicks to raise to provide meat.

Fatoumata is not responsible for providing for any particular expenses, so she is saving her profits and plans to buy a freezer to conserve the chickens after slaughter.  This would reduce her expenses.  In the future, Fatoumata would like to increase the number of chickens that she raises, increase her profits and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy chicks to raise and then resell.

loans.name: Ngoné

texts.fr:
Ngoné, célibataire sans enfant, évolue dans le domaine du commerce et de l’élevage depuis 2010. Elle travaille aussi comme agent de sécurité depuis quelques mois. Ngoné est une habituée de l’IMCEC, elle a déjà eu à bénéficier de trois crédits payés normalement. Avec ce renouvellement, elle envisage d’acheter une bande de 150 poussins et de l’aliment volaille pour élever et revendre.
Ngoné est célibataire et vit chez ses parents, où elle donne sa participation dans la gestion de la dépense quotidienne.
Avec les bénéfices de son activité, elle a mis un peu d’argent de coté qui lui a permis d’acquérir un terrain. Comme projet futur, elle veut renforcer son commerce et entamer la construction de sa parcelle.
texts.en:
Ngoné is single and has no children.  She has been raising chickens since 2010.  She has also been working as a security guard for several months.  Ngoné is a long-standing client of the field partner, UIMCEC and has already had three loans which were repaid on time.  She plans to use this new loan to buy 150 chicks and chicken feed.  She will then raise the chicks and ell them.

Ngoné is single and lives at home with her parents, where she contributes to the day-to-day expenses of the family.  She has managed to save a portion of her income and has now bought a plot of land.  In the future, she would like to strengthen her business and begin construction on her land.

loans.use: to buy 150 chicks to raise for resale.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
"My name is Josephine, a final year student at the University of Ghana, and I am pursuing a Bachelor of Arts Degree. The loan facility is to help pay for my school fees and hostel fees.

My mother inspires me mostly. She encourages me and pushes me to do my best for me and the whole family.

My chosen profession will enable me to impart knowledge to others in my community and earn income to help my family financially.

I see myself working with a reputable company and studying for my master's degree in the next five to ten years. It would enable me to acquire the skills to help me get a good job and further my education, without which I cannot climb higher on the educational ladder and become financially independent. Without this loan facility I would have to rely on my parents and might not graduate as planned.

My country, Ghana, is one of the democratically and politically stable nations in West Africa, endowed with many natural resources like gold, cocoa, timber and oil."

loans.use: to pay for her tuition and hostel fees.

loans.name: Mor

texts.fr:
Mor est un jeune ouvrier spécialisé dans le carrelage et  qui exerce le métier depuis plus de 10 ans. Il travaille de 8h à 19h.
 Il est marié et père d’un enfant d’un an. Il vit en famille et s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne avec ses frères. Mor a déjà bénéficié de deux crédits tous destinés à la réfection de la maison familiale. Ce troisième servira aussi à la réfection de la toiture de sa chambre. 
Mor fait des économies car il aimerait acheter un terrain pour le construire et y loger sa famille.
Mor rêve aussi d’ouvrir une quincaillerie.
texts.en:
Mor is a young workman who specializes in tiling.  He has more than ten years' experience in this field, and works from eight in the morning until seven at night.  Mor is married and has a one-year-old child.  He lives with his family and, together with his brothers, provides for their day-to-day needs.

Mor has already had two loans which have been used to renovate the family home.  This third loan will be used to rebuild the roof of his room.

Mor is currently saving to buy a plot of land so he can build a home for his family.  He also dreams of opening a hardware shop.

loans.use: to rebuild the roof of his house.

loans.name: Awa Mbaye

texts.fr:
Madame Awa Mbaye, marié et mère de 6 enfants, évolue dans le commerce depuis 4 ans. Elle revient pour la 4ème fois à l’IMCEC pour solliciter un crédit de 100 000f CFA pour acheter de la marchandise et préparer les fêtes qui s’annoncent. Elle va acheter des chaussures, des tissus, des ensembles pour enfants pour revendre.
Awa Mbaye s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne, aidée de son fils ainé âgé de 27 ans.
Grâce aux crédits, elle a pu construire sa cantine et mettre un peu d’argent de coté pour appuyer ses enfants et les aider à démarrer une activité.
texts.en:
Awa Mbaye is married and has six children.  She has been working in commerce for four years.  This will be her fourth loan with the field partner, UIMCEC.  She has requested 100,000 francs CFA in order to buy stock to prepare for the forthcoming festival.  She will buy shoes, fabric and children's clothing for resale.

Awa Mbaye provides for the day-to-day expenses, helped by her eldest son who is 27 years old.

Thanks to the loans that she has had, Awa Mbaye has been able to build a shop and put money to one side to support her children with establishing themselves in business.

loans.use: to buy shoes, fabric and clothing for children, all for resale.

loans.name: Ahmed Baba

texts.en:
Ahmed Baba is a Beninese artisan who specializes in hand-carved figurines and jewelry boxes. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials including wood, aluminum, and polish.

Ahmed Baba has been selling through Novica since 2008. This is his story:

"After completing my elementary education, I became a self-taught woodcarver. My creations are both decorative and utilitarian. My materials come from our environment, and I use various types of wood and plate to form different designs. I feel proud to have shown my art in Germany, the United States, South Africa, and Namibia."

"Without your support, I do not know how I could have survived in this business. I thank you so much."

Use the link below to view Ahmed Baba's hand-carved figurines and jewelry boxes on the Novica site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/6846

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of raw materials including wood, aluminum, and polish

loans.name: Ndèye

texts.fr:
Mademoiselle Ndèye a démarré un petit commerce de produits cosmétiques il ya 3 ans de cela. Elle a débuté avec ses propres moyens avec une somme de vingt mille francs tirée d’une épargne personnelle. Elle vient solliciter une somme qui lui permettra de renforcer son capital. Avec 50 000F CFA, elle pourra acheter 30 parfums et après vente, avoir un bénéfice de 25 000F CFA. Elle fait l’ambulant de 10h à 13h  et l’après midi, elle s’active ailleurs.
Ndèye n’a pas de charges sinon ses besoins personnels, elle vit chez ses parents.
Elle veut hisser son commerce à un niveau supérieur et ouvrir une cantine pour diversifier et vendre en même temps des produits cosmétiques.
texts.en:
Ndèye started selling cosmetic products three years ago, with 20,000 francs CFA of her own savings.  She has now requested a loan of 50,000 francs CFA to increase her working capital.  She plans to buy 30 perfumes, which she expects to generate a profit of 25,000 francs CFA.  She sells her perfume on foot between ten in the morning and one, and then in the afternoon she works elsewhere.  Ndèye is only responsible for her personal expenses as she lives at home with her parents.

Ndèye would like to take her business to a higher level, open her own shop and diversify her product range to include cosmetic products.

loans.use: to buy 30 varieties of perfume for resale.

loans.name: Amy

texts.fr:
Madame Amy, âgée de 30 ans, mariée et mère de 4 enfants, évolue dans le domaine du commerce. Elle a démarré son activité en 2011 avec un capital minime. Son commerce consiste à vendre des draps de lit, des chaussures et des divers. 
Amy est mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont trois garçons et une fille. Elle est prise en charge par son époux et ne s’occupe que de ses petits besoins personnels. 
Amy est une habituée des services d’IMCEC et ce 4ème crédit va lui servir à acheter de la marchandise et revendre pour préparer la fête de la Tabaski : des draps de lit, des chaussures des ensembles pour enfants
Amy souhaite avoir la santé afin de pouvoir travailler pour régler ses propres besoins et construire un jour sa propre maison.
texts.en:
Amy is 30 years old, married and mother to four children, three boys and one girl.  She began working in commerce in 2011 with minimal working capital. She sells bed sheets, shoes and other products.  Her husband provides for all their expenses so she is only responsible for her own personal needs.

Amy is a long-standing client of the field partner, UIMCEC, this will be her fourth loan.  She plans to use it to buy stock (bed sheets, shoes and clothing for children) for resale prior to the Tabaski festival.

Amy hopes for good health to enable her to work, to provide for her own needs, and, one day, build her own house.

loans.use: to buy bed sheets, shoes and clothing for children, all for resale.

loans.name: Benkadi  A Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe BENKADI A sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 35 ans, ont en moyenne 6 enfants et vivant la plupart dans des familles traditionnelles à SANZANA une commune dans le cercle de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du MALI.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur quatrième prêt de campagne avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est d’arachide avec madame RAMA débout à la deuxième position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo dans ce groupe de femme BENKADI A. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter 2 sacs de 50 kg d’engrais, 1 bidon d’herbicide, payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  0, 5 hectare. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village, à SIKASSO  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes au comptant et à crédit.
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 66 000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et son intérêt, aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Benkadi A Group are all married women who are, on average, 35 years old and have six children.  Most of them live in traditional families in the commune of Sanzana, Sikasso district (the third administrative region of Mali).

The women work with the field partner, Soro Yiriwaso, during the winter months, in order to improve their agricultural businesses.  This will be their fourth production loan, the previous loans were all fully and correctly repaid.

Rama (standing second from the left in the photo) grows peanuts.  She plans to use her loan to buy two 50kg sacks of fertilizer, one drum of herbicide and pay labour costs to work half a hectare of land.  After harvesting, the produce is sold locally in the village, in Sikasso, to both men and women, for cash or on credit.

Rama expects to earn an average profit of 66,000 francs CFA over the loan period.  This will be used to repay her loan and interest, and help her husband to provide for the day-to-day expenses of their family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides and pay labour costs for her agriculture business.

loans.name: Benkadi  B Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe BENKADI B sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 39 ans, ont en moyenne 6 enfants et vivant la plupart dans des familles traditionnelles à SANZANA une commune dans le cercle de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du MALI.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur quatrième prêt de campagne avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est d’arachide avec madame CHATA B assises à la deuxième position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo dans ce groupe de femme BENKADI B. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter 2 sacs de 50 kg d’engrais, 2 bidons d’herbicide, payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  0, 5 hectare. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village, à SIKASSO  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes au comptant et à crédit.
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 74 000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et son intérêt, aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Benkadi B Group are all married women who are, on average, 39 years old and have six children.  Most of them live in traditional families in the commune of Sanzana, Sikasso district (the third administrative region of Mali).

The women work with the field partner, Soro Yiriwaso, during the winter months, in order to improve their agricultural businesses.  This will be their fourth production loan, the previous loans were all fully and correctly repaid.

Chata B (sitting second from the right in the photo) grows peanuts.  She plans to use her loan to buy two 50kg sacks of fertilizer, two drums of herbicide and pay labour costs to work half a hectare of land.  After harvesting, the produce is sold locally in the village, in Sikasso, to both men and women, for cash or on credit.

Chata B expects to earn an average profit of 74,000 francs CFA over the loan period.  This will be used to repay her loan and interest, and help her husband to provide for the day-to-day expenses of their family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides and pay labour costs for her agriculture business.

loans.name: Badegna Group

texts.fr:
Les quatre membres du groupe  BADEGNA  sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 37 ans, et ont en moyenne 2 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles traditionnelles  à MEDINE un des quartiers populaires dans la ville de Sikasso 3ème région administrative du Mali.
Elles sont à leur seizième prêt solidaire avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle. 
Madame AMINATA assises à la deuxième position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo dans ce groupe des femmes  BADEGNA, fait la vente  des oranges.
Elle compte acheter avec son prêt  des quantités importantes d’orange d’où elle est beaucoup sollicitée de sa clientèle pour la qualité de ses produits pour la revendre en détail au marché à une clientèle composée d’ homme et de femme au comptant et à crédit. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 26 000 francs CFA dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son intérêt et l’autre pour son épargne.
texts.en:
The four members of the Badegna Group are all married women who are, on average, 37 years old and have two children.  Most of them live in traditional families in Medine, a popular district of the town of Sikasso (the third administrative region of Mali).

This will be the sixteenth group loan for the women from the field partner, Soro Yiriwaso, and will be used to satisfy the demands of their customers.

Aminata (sitting second from the left in the photo) sells oranges.  She plans to use her loan to buy a large quantity of oranges.  Aminata is much sought after for the quality of her oranges which she retails at the market to both men and women, for cash or on credit.

Aminata expects to earn an average monthly profit of 26,000 francs CFA, which will be used to repay her loan and interest, and for her savings.

loans.use: to buy oranges for resale.

loans.name: Grupo Las Blanquitas Group

texts.es: Grupo solidario formado por tres socias empresarias de éxito, una de ellas es Giussella tiene 32 años de edad, es acompañada y su negocio es la venta de ropa, zapatos en su comunidad. Este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de camisetas, jeans de damas, jeans de caballeros, faldas, shores, talladores, ropa interior de dama etc. Lucia tiene 30 años de edad y su negocio es la hecha y venta de nacatamales, destaza cerdos y vende frito de cerdo y Mirna tiene 26 años su negocio destaza cerdo y comercializa la carne.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is made up of three successful businesswomen.

One of them is Giusella who is 32 years old. She has a partner and has a business selling clothing and shoes in her community.

She will use the loan to buy t-shirts, women's jeans, men's jeans, skirts, shorts, women's underwear etc.

Lucia is 30 years old and makes and sells nacatamales. She also slaughters pigs and sells fried pork. Mirna is 26 years old and has a business slaughtering pigs and selling the meat.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, men's and women's jeans, vest tops and underwear etc.

loans.name: Juana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Juana Elizabeth tiene 31 años de edad, vive con su conyuge y su menor hijo, en el sector de San Nicolas, donde la vida es muy tranquila y armoniosa, dicha comunidad esta ubicada en el dsitrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Juana Elizabeth se dedica a las actividad de cria y venta de animales con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que está ubicado en su mismo domicilio, él solicita préstamo para la compra de ganado vacuno, dicha inversión le servirá para poder diversificar su negocio. Lo que en un corto plazo le generá mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende una mejoria en su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juana Elizabeth is 31 years old and lives with her husband and her young son in the sector of San Nicolas, where life is very peaceful and harmonious. This community is situated in the Zaña district in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru.

Juana Elizabeth makes a living raising and selling animals and has more than five years' experience in this business, which is based at her home.

She is asking for the loan to buy cattle. This investment will help her to diversify her business. In the short term this will give her more income, better profits and as a result an improvement in her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cattle to diversify her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bottled drinks, fruit, meat, cornflour, firewood, oil, gas etc. for her business.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel es un hombre de 40 años de edad, esta casado y se dedica al comercio; es padre de tres hijos de 19, 16 y 12 años de edad.

Él es agente de seguridad privada, pero se dedica al comercio tambien, estudio hasta noveno grado y su esposa trabaja en los oficios domesticos y atiende una tienda de ropa propia. Isabel trabaja en una tienda, la tiene desde hace cinco años, y necesita el credito para compra mas productos y surtirla como arroz, frijoles, aceite, azucar, sal, galletas, golosinas, bebidas, etc. 

El préstamo le mejorara mucho porque podra ofrecerle a los clientes mas productos,y asi le generara mayor ingreso economico.

Sueña con trabajar de la mejor manera, para poderles dar estudio a sus hijos hasta donde sea posible y que puedan tener oportunidad de un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Isabel, who is a 40-year-old businessman, is married and is the father of three children aged 19, 16 and 12. He is a private security guard but also works in retail. He studied as far as ninth grade. His wife looks after the house and works in her own clothing shop. 

Isabel works in a shop which he has had for 5 years. He needs the loan to buy more products to stock the shop, such as rice, beans, oil, sugar, salt, biscuits, sweets, drinks etc.

The loan will improve things a lot as he will be able to offer his customers more products and this will generate more income for him.

His dream is to work to the best of his abilities so he can give his children an education for as long as possible, so they can have the opportunity of a better future.

loans.use: to buy products for the shop such as rice, beans, oil, sugar, salt, biscuits, sweets, drinks etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fizzy drinks, women's underwear, t-shirts, men's and women's shirts etc.

loans.name: Yahya

texts.en:
Yahya is a 52-year-old married man and a father of nine children; he lives with his family in a rented house in Haja city, Yemen. He is an educated man with a university education. Due to high rates of unemployment in the country, Yahya couldn’t find a job to look after his family. In order to provide his family with the necessities, Yahya decided to purchase a motorcycle to work as a driver to transport people from one area to another. This way he can earn money that will help him to cover the expenses of the family. Unfortunately, Yahya doesn't have enough money to do that. For this reason, he applied for a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase a motorcycle. 

Yahya looks forward to purchasing a taxi to work on it as a driver in order to earn a good money to provide his family with a secure future.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to provide transport services.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Doña María, tiene 55 años de edad, está soltera, tiene 8 hijos, vive con su familia, en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su casa donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como ser  pan, arroz, azúcar, café, huevos, churros, condimentos etc. Anteriormente solo vendía carnes. Ha invertido varios préstamos a su negocio y actualmente solicita otro por 11,000 lempiras, este dinero lo invertirá, en la compra de productos de pan, azúcar, arroz, café, y otros abarrotes para surtir su negocio y hacerlo crecer como su fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
María is 55 years old and is single. She has 8 children and lives with her family in the town of San Pedro Sula. She has a grocery business located in her home where she sells basic everyday groceries such as bread, rice, sugar, coffee, eggs, doughnuts, condiments etc. Prior to this she just sold meat. 

María has invested several loans in her business and now she is asking for another loan of 11,000 lempiras. She will use the money to buy products such as bread, sugar, rice, coffee and other groceries to stock her business, and to make it grow as her source of income.

loans.use: to buy products such as bread, sugar, rice, coffee and other groceries to stock her business.

loans.name: Guadalupe Del Rosario

texts.es:
Guadalupe es una joven de 21 años con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es soltera y vive en Quilmana junto a su familia.
Con mucho esfuerzo está estudiando la carrera de Secretariado y para poder pagar sus mensualidades trabaja como vendedora de comida, Guadalupe cree que le va bien en su negocio porque siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace, es amable con los clientes y sus platos son deliciosos.
Guadalupe está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá seguir construyendo su casa para comodidad de su familia. De esta manera su nivel de vida mejorará y seguirá luchando por el bienestar de su familia y más adelante poder terminar de construir toda su casa.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is a 21 year old young woman who really wants to get ahead. She is single and lives in Quilmana with her family. With a lot of hard work she is in secretary school. In order to pay her tuition, she works selling food. Guadalupe thinks that her business is going well for her because she always works hard at everything she does, she is friendly to her customers and her dishes are delicious.   

Guadalupe is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support they have given she will be able to keep building her house for her family's comfort. This way, her quality of life will improve and in the future she will be able to finish building her whole house.

loans.use: to build a house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a room on the second floor of his home.

loans.name: Russbel Uber

texts.es:
Russbel es un joven emprendedor de 20 años, trabaja brindando servicios de transporte en una mototaxi que tiene en su ciudad natal, Lima. Labora por más de 10 horas diarias. Todos los días despierta con muchas ganas por salir adelante. Su familia es una de las mayores razones en la vida por quien lucha para poder brindarles un futuro mejor.
Russbel está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá pagar la regularización de algunos documentos de su moto para que tenga todo en regla y continúe circulando por la zona sin ningún problema. De esta manera sus ingresos mejorarán y espera cumplir su meta más adelante de poder comprarse una flota de motos y convertirse en un gran empresario.
texts.en:
Russbel is a young entrepreneur, at only 20 years old. He works providing transport services in a mototaxi in his hometown of Lima. He works more than 10 hours each day. Every day he wakes up eager to earn money to get ahead. He tries each day to bring a better future to his family, who are one of the biggest reasons he works so hard.

Russbel is very grateful to the lenders at Kiva, because with the support they provide he will be able to pay to get some documents for his moto. Therefore, he will be complying with all the rules and will continue driving in his city with no problems. This will lead to a higher income. He hopes to meet his goal of someday being able to buy a fleet of motos and convert his work in to a bigger business.

loans.use: to get his mototaxi documents

loans.name: Jordy Wilver

texts.es:
Jordy es un joven luchador de 21 años, soltero y vive en Vista Alegre junto a su familia. Por algunas situaciones económicas no pudo estudiar una profesión, es por ello que al terminar el colegio empezó a trabajar para apoyar a su familia. Desde hace algunos años trabaja como vendedor y distribuidor de ladrillos, y cree que le va bien por su constante dedicación, esfuerzo y sobre todo porque a pesar de las dificultades siempre afronta todo con una gran sonrisa.
Jordy está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comenzar a construir su casa de material noble, de esta manera su calidad de vida mejorará y su familia estará más cómoda y segura. Más adelante Jordy sueña con tener un negocio propio.
texts.en:
Jordy, aged 21, is a hard-working young man. He is single and lives with his family in Vista Alegre. Because of his financial situation he was not able to study for a profession and so when he finished college he started work in order to support his family. For a few years he has worked as a seller and distributor of bricks. He thinks it is going well for him because of his constant commitment and hard work and above all because in spite of his difficulties he deals with everything with a big smile.

Jordy is grateful to the Kiva lenders because, with the help they have given him, he will be able to start building his house from good quality materials. By doing this his quality of life will improve and his family will be more comfortable and secure.

Jordy dreams of having his own business at some point in the future.

loans.use: to build his house.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
David tiene 20 años de edad, es soltera, sin hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia; vive en una zona rural, del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

David se dedica a brindar servicio de mototaxi; hace 3 años, él solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo; compra de motor y piezas para su mototaxi, lo que le va a permitir asegurar el correcto funcionamiento de su herramienta de trabajo, para poder seguir generando sus ingresos.
texts.en:
David is 20 years old. He is single and is not raising any children. He lives in his own home in a rural area of the district of Oyotún, province of Chiclayo, region of Lambayeque, on the northern coast of Peru. 

David has worked offering motorcycle taxi services for 3 years. He is asking for the loan to invest in a fixed asset buy buying a motor and parts for his motorcycle taxi, which will allow him to ensure the functioning of its work tool so he can keep generating income.

loans.use: to invest in a fixed asset by buying a motor and parts for his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Francois

texts.en:
Francois is 31 years old. He is married with 1 child who is one year old.

He sells shoes and has been selling in a business for 8 years. With the loan, he would like to buy more shoes for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in this same business.

loans.use: to buy more shoes for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a pantry and a door.

loans.name: Benito

texts.es:
Benito tiene 26 años de edad, reside en caserío Piedra Herrada, desde hace más de 10 años, vive en casa familiar junto a su esposa con carga familiar. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, además de el comercio, dicha comunidad esta ubicada en el distrito de Buenos Aires, provincia de Morropon, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

Benito ofrece el servicio de transporte de carga y también se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado vacuno y ovino hace más de 4 años en negocio con clientela fija, además también realiza actividades agrícolas. El destino del crédito será para activo fijo para la compra de una motocarga para su negocio ya que la motocarga con la que ofrece su servicos es alquilada y por eso el desea mejor comprarse una y pagar mensual pero ya por algo que es de su propiedad, lo que le va ayudar a generar mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Benito is 26 years old. He has lived in the community of Piedra Herrada, for more than 10 years. He lives in a relative's house with his wife and family. Life in the community is peaceful and people work in agriculture and livestock and as merchants. The community is in the district of Buenos Aires, province of Morropon, region of Piura, on the northern coast of Peru.

Benito offers cargo transport services. He has also bought and sold cattle and sheep for more than 4 years, with regular customers. He also does farming activities. The loan will be used for fixed capital, a cargo motorcycle, for his business. Right now he offers his services with a rented cargo motorcycle and he wants to buy one and make monthly payments for something he will own. This will help him generate better income, more profits and therefore a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a fixed asset, a cargo motorcycle, for his business.

loans.name: Lucy Anabel

texts.es:
Lucy Anabel tiene 33 años de edad, su estado civil es soltera, reside en el distrito de Buenos Aires, junto a sus dos menores hijos desde hace más de 15 años, la vida en la comunidad es tranquila y se dedican a la crianza y comercio de ganado, además de la agricultura; dicha comunidad esta ubicada en la provincia de Morropon, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Lucy Anabel es a la producción de plátano y crianza y venta de animales como es ganado caprino. Actividad que realiza desde hace más de 15 años, con experiencia en la zona y en el negocio. Destino del crédito será para la compra de activos biológicos, ya que clienta también se dedica a la agricultura; lo que le va a permitir mejorar sus ingresos, y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lucy Anabel is 33 years old and is single. She has lived in the district of Buenos Aires with her two young children for more than 15 years. Life in the community is peaceful and the locals make a living from raising and selling animals, as well as from agriculture. Buenos Aires is situated in the province of Morropon in the Piura region on the north coast of Peru.

Lucy Anabel makes a living growing bananas and raising and selling animals such as goats. She has been doing this for more than 15 years and has experience in the business and in the local area. She will use the loan to buy plants, since she also works in agriculture. This will enable her to improve her income and so improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his heavy machinery training.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en: Juan Jose currently lives with his partner. He is an Elementary school teacher in the mornings. He inherited an eye problem, which prevents him from seeing far. This visual problem has brought him many labor difficulties, so he decided to have eye surgery and have his eyeglasses removed permanently as it was very uncomfortable for him to conduct his daily activities

loans.use: To have an eye surgery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay his Institute's monthly fees.

loans.name: Ingrid Zoraida

texts.es:
Ingrid es una joven emprendedora de 21 años, tiene un hijo de 3 años y vive en Imperial junto a su familia. Es madre soltera y día a día lucha para poder sacar adelante a su pequeño y darle todas las comodidades que se merece. Por iniciativa propia se dedica a la venta de gelatinas y alfajores en un mercado de su ciudad, ella cree que le va bien porque siempre se esfuerza, es muy dedicada a su labor y amable con los clientes.
Ingrid está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comprar insumos como sobres de gelatinas, harina, huevos, entre otros para poder seguir elaborando sus deliciosa gelatinas y alfajores para su negocio, así su negocio mejorará y ella seguirá esforzándose para sacar adelante a su familia y más adelante poder construir su casa propia.
texts.en:
Ingrid, aged 21, is an enterprising young woman. She has a 3-year-old son and lives with her family in Imperial. She is a single mother and strives every day to be able to bring up her little son and to give him all the comforts he deserves. On her own initiative she started up the business selling jellies and alfajores [biscuits sandwiched together with a sweet filling] in a market in her city. She thinks it is going well for her because she always works hard, she is very committed to her work and she is friendly with her customers.

Ingrid is grateful to the Kiva lenders because the help they have provided will enable her to buy supplies such as packets of gelatine, flour, eggs and other items so she can continue making her delicious jellies and alfajores for her business. In this way her business will improve and she will keep working hard to bring up her family, and further in the future she will be able to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business selling jellies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the paperwork to get his driver's license.

loans.name: María Mercedes

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Nueva Esperanza se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.
En este lugar vive  la señora María,  tiene 19 años, está casada  y de esta relación tiene un hijo de 2 años de edad. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña María es una muy buena esposa que  realiza el crédito para el negocio de su esposo el cual  se dedica al comercio, el tiene un puesto en una calle en el centro de la ciudad en la cual muchos vendedores como el muestran sus productos para la venta, el vende ropa de todo tipo, trabaja todos los días casi todo el día, en ocasiones se desplaza a otros cantones aprovechando los días de feria, en estos lugares el instala un pequeño puesto para vender ya que es cuando más personas visitan estos lugares, lleva más de 10 años con esta actividad con la cual salen delante de una forma honrada.
Este crédito lo va a utilizar para que su esposo compre todo tipo de  ropa. Lleva 3 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella se siente útil. Su sueño es tener un local en el centro de la ciudad.
texts.en:
Nueva Esperanza Communal Bank meets every two weeks in Picoaza Parish in the city of Portoviejo, known for being a very commercial area, for its traditional San Pedro and San Pablo festivals, and for its happy people.

María, 19, lives there.  She's married and has a two-year-old son.  Her husband's a merchant.

María's a very good wife who's getting the loan for her husband's business.  A merchant, he has a stall on a street downtown where many vendors like himself display their products for sale.  He sells all types of clothing and works almost all day, every day.  Sometimes he goes to other cantons and sets up a small stall to take advantage of the market days, because that's when more people go to those places.  He has been doing this job for more than 10 years, and they get ahead honorably.

She's going to use this loan for her husband to buy a variety of clothes.  She has been in the communal bank for three loan cycles and she likes it because she feels the loans are useful.

Her dream is to have a store downtown.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Bertalina Monserrate

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Nueva Esperanza se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.
En este lugar vive  la señora Bertalina, tiene 33 años, está casada  y de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 13, 12 y 3 años, los dos mayores estudian en colegio. Su esposo es albañil y comerciante.
Ella es una muy buena ama de casa que realiza el crédito para ayudarle a su marido  en su negocio por el bienestar de su familia, el se dedica a la venta de controles remotos de todas las marcas, estuches y accesorios de teléfonos celulares, su forma de venta es informal, el recorre toda la ciudad ofreciendo y vendiendo estos productos, son más de diez años que se dedica a esta actividad comercial y siempre le ha ido bien ya que nunca le ha faltado para llevar el sustento diario al hogar.
Este crédito es para comprar controles remotos, accesorios y carcasas de teléfonos, entre otras cosas. Este es su segundo ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella  le ayuda a su marido a salir adelante. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The communal bank Nueva Esperanza meets every fortnight in the Picoaza parish in the city of Portoviejo. It is known as being a very commercial zone, for its traditional fiestas of San Pedro and San Pablo and for the happiness of its people. This is the place where Bertalina lives, 33 years old, married and from this relationship three children of 13, 12 and 3 years old. The two older children go to high school. Her husband is a bricklayer and a tradesman.

She is a very good housewife who is taking out this loan to help her husband in his business for the wellbeing of the family. He works selling remote controls of all brands, cases and accessories for cellphones. His way of selling is casual, he goes over the whole city showing and selling these products. He has been in this line of work for more than ten years and he has always done really well and as he has never failed to bring home the bacon.

This loan is to buy remote controls, accessories and phone cases, amongst other things. This is her second cycle in the communal bank and she likes it because with the loans she can help her husband to get ahead. Her dreams are to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to buy remote controls, accessories and phone cases, etc.

loans.name: Lorena Patricia

texts.es:
La Señora. Lorena forma parte del grupo de crédito Mujeres Triunfadoras, vive por el Centro de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que se caracteriza por ser de clima frió, tiene una gran belleza arquitectónica y natural, su gente es muy cálida, su variedad en la gastronomía que cautiva el paladar de propios y extraño. 
La Señora Lorena tiene 37 años de edad, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 16 y 11 años, su primer hijo está estudiando en el colegio y su hija está en una escuelita de la ciudad, su esposo es técnico en computación, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
Doña Lorena trabaja de lunes a sábados en una floristería, esta actividad le permite tener un ingreso estable, pero para tener un ingreso extra se dedica a la venta de ropa. El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de ropa. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Lorena belongs to the "Mujeres Triunfadoras" (Triumphant Women) lending group.  She lives in the city of Cuenca, a city known for its cold climate and its natural and architectural beauty.  The city's people are very warm, and they have a diverse cuisine that captivates the palates of both residents and tourists.  

Lorena is 37 years old, married and has two children ages 16 and 11.  Her eldest son is in high school, and her daughter is in the local school.  Her husband works as a computer technician.  They do not own their home so they currently rent.  Lorena works Monday-Saturday in a flower shop.  This job allows her to earn a stable income, but she also works selling clothing in order to supplement that income.

The money from this loan will be used to purchase clothing.  Her dream is to have her own home.

loans.use: purchase clothing.

loans.name: Sandra Johanna

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Nueva Esperanza se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.
En este lugar vive la señora Sandra, tiene 29 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 14 y 7 años, la  mayor  estudian en colegio y el menor  escuela. El marido es comerciante. 
Doña Sandra es una muy buena esposa que  realiza el crédito para el negocio del esposo, el vende ropa interior, medias, camisetas, gorras, entre otras prendas, trabaja todos los días casi todo, recorre las calles de la ciudad vendiendo sus productos y en ocasiones se desplaza a otros cantones aprovechando los días de ferias, su esposo lleva más de 7 años con esta actividad con el cual salen adelante.
Este crédito lo va a utilizar para que su esposo compre ropa interior, ropa y gorras. Lleva 6 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella le ayuda a su marido. Su sueño es tener un local para vender su mercadería.
texts.en:
The Nueva Esperanza communal bank meets every 15 days in the Picoaza parish of the city of Portoviejo. Portoviejo is known for being a very commercial zone, for its traditional celebrations of San Pedro and San Pablo and for the happiness of its people. This is where Sandra lives, she is 29 years old and is in a common-law marriage from which she has two sons of 14 and 7 years old. The oldest goes to high school and the youngest to school. Her husband is a shopkeeper.

Sandra is a very good wife that takes loans for her husband's business. He sells underwear, tights, T-shirts, caps, amongst other garments. He works almost every day, roaming the streets of the city selling his products and sometimes he goes to other cantons taking advantage of market days. Her husband has been in this business for more than 7 years, with which they get through.

This loan will be used to buy underwear, clothing and caps. She has been in this communal bank for 6 years and she likes in because she can help her husband with the loans. Her dream is to have a shop to sell the merchandise.

loans.use: to buy underwear, clothing and caps.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es: Doña  Rosa es una madre orgullosa de sus hijos quienes son muy estudiosos y hoy en día son profesionales e independientes, ella por años se ha dedicado a la venta de nacatamales en su casa, labor que le ayudo a mantener a su familia junto a su esposo, con el tiempo logro culminar sus estudios y ahora también trabaja como psicóloga de un programa social, solicita el crédito para realizar un cuarto en su vivienda que vendrá a aportar mayor comodidad en su hogar.
texts.en: Rosa is a proud mother of her children who are very studious, and are now independent professionals.  For years, she has worked selling tamales in her home, a job that helped her and her husband support their family.  In time, she was able to complete her education, and she now also works as a psychologist for a social work program.  She is seeking this loan to build a room in her house that will provide greater comfort in their home.

loans.use: Purchase bricks, cement, sand, and iron.

loans.name: María Ignacia

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Nueva Esperanza se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 65 años de edad, hace varios años su marido falleció pero de esta relación tiene 6 hijos mayores de edad, ella vive con una hija.
Doña María es una mujer muy luchadora que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder salir adelante se dedica a la venta de sabanas, sobrecamas, edredones, toldos, toallas, entre otras cosas, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, trabaja casi todos los días en las tardes ya que es cuando encuentra a sus clientes y aprovecha para vender y cobrar ya que deja a crédito y cobra por semanas,  lleva más de 10 años en este negocio con el cual puede salir adelante sola.
Este crédito es para comprar sabanas, edredones, toallas, cortinas, entre otras cosas. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The "Nueva Esperanza" (New Hope) lending croup meets every two weeks in the Picoaza Parrish of the city of Portoviejo.  Picoaza is known for being a very commercial region, for is traditional San Pedro and San Pablo festivals, and its happy people.  María lives here, and she is 65 years old.  A few years ago, her husband passed away.  From this marriage, she has six children who are now adults.  She currently lives with one of her daughters.

María is a fighter who sells bed sheets, bedspreads, quilts, tents, towels and other items in order to earn an income and get ahead.  She makes her sales door-to-door and she works almost everyday in the afternoons because that is when she is able to find her customers so she takes advantage of this to make her sales and collect her payments since she makes sales on credit, charging them weekly.  She has been in this business for 10 years, which has allowed her to get ahead on her own.

This loan will be used to purchase bedsheets, quilts, towels, curtains and other items.  She has been a part of this lending group since its inception, and she enjoys it because the loans are fast and they help a lot.  Her dream is to be in good health.

loans.use: purchase bed sheets, quilts, towels, curtains, etc...

loans.name: Asma

texts.en:
Asma is a 23-year-old married woman from Dhupguri. Her husband, Jakir, is a 33-year-old farmer. Asma and her husband live in the small village Madhya Boragari in Jalpaiguri district. They both studied till 10th standard.

Asma's husband is a farmer. As a farmer, her husband has sound knowledge of paddy cultivation. Asma helps her husband in his agricultural works and they cover the household expenses through their profits in the rice farming business.  Whatever they earn is not sufficient to manage their family expenses, however. She hopes to keep increasing their income by continuous development of her crop production.

So Asma is now asking for a loan to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides for use in farming. They believe ensuring good growth and nutrition to crops will lead to abundant harvests. She will save the additional revenue for the family's future expenses.

She is grateful to both BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and seeds for paddy cultivation.

loans.name: Nelso

texts.es:
Nelso tiene 32 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 02 hijos, vive con su familia en una zona rural del ditrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Nelso se dedica a la venta y cria de animales con más de 4 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que está ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, solicita préstamo para compra de animales dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad, y un numero mayor d stock, con gran influencia en el negocio; cliente piensa incrementar sus animales de corral (patos, pollos, conejos, cuyes, entre otros)para obtener más clientes y más ventas, lo que le va a generar mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende podrá tener una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Nelso is 32 years old, is in a common-law marriage, and has two children.  He lives with his family in a rural area in the Oyotún district in the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region on Peru's northern coast.

Nelso works raising and selling animals.  He has over four years of experience in this business that is located in the rear part of his home.  He is seeking a loan to purchase animals so that he can increase his stock and the variety of animals he has, which will have a positive effect on his business.  He hopes to increase the amount of barnyard animals (ducks, chickens, rabbits, guinea pigs, etc...) in order to attract more customers and increase his sales.  This will help generate greater earnings, a greater income and improve his life.

loans.use: purchase animals to increase his variety and his inventory.

loans.name: Atishwari

texts.en:
Atishwari is a rural woman of 48 years who hails from Dhupguri. She is married to Jiten, a 60-year-old farmer. They are blessed with two sons who are grown up and are engaged in the carpentry business. They live in West Magurmari, a small village in Jalpaiguri district. 

Her husband is a very hardworking man. He cultivates on his ancestral land. He mainly grows paddy rice. He thinks his business goes well because he has a lot of knowledge about its production and always offers quality products. He supplies his paddy rice to the rice dealers in the nearby market. 

In order to strengthen the business and respond to client demand, Atishwari is requesting a loan from BJS ( Kiva's partner) to purchase fertilizers, pesticides, and seeds and to cover the operational costs. Their goal is to increase their business activity.

Atishwari is very thankful for Kiva and BJS. With this investment, at the end of the harvest, she will be able to have a better production, and with these earnings, she will be able to improve her family’s quality of life.

Her dream is to construct a better house for them.

loans.use: To purchase farm supplies for paddy cultivation.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline is 34 years old. She is married and has six children between 15 and 4 years old. Four of them go to school. 

She has a shop and has been running a business for the past three years. With the loan, she would like to buy Fanta, juice, rice and salt for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy Fanta, juice, rice and salt for sale.

loans.name: Donathille

texts.en: Donathille is 34 years old. She is married and has 2 children aged 7 and 4 years. One of them goes to school. She has a shop that she has been running for the past ten years. With this loan, she would like to buy more rice, cooking oil, lotion and sugar to sell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy more rice, cooking oil, lotion and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Carmen María

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Nueva Esperanza se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.
En este lugar vive la señora Carmen, tiene 58 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, una de sus hijas viven con ella. Su marido trabaja en el campo. 
Doña Carmen para salir adelante hace varios años en sociedad con una hija instalaron en su casa una tienda de víveres  la cual empezaron con el primer crédito que recibió del banco,  allí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, carnes, helados, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su hija y ella trabajan allí y ya son 13 años que tienen este negocio el cual les da para vivir honradamente.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda, va a comprar productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Grupo De Crédito hace 13 años y le gusta porque así empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son seguir aumentando su negocio.
texts.en:
The "Nueva Esperanza" loan group meets every fortnight in the Picoaza parish of Portoviejo city. Picoaza is known very being an area that has a lot of trade. It is also known for the traditional "San Pedro" and San Pablo" festivals, and for the happy people who live here.

And it is here that 58-year-old Carmen lives. Carmen is married and has three adult children. One of her daughters lives with her. Carmen's husband works in the fields.

In order to get ahead, for a number of years, Carmen has had a business that she co-runs with her daughter. The business is a grocery store that they run out of their house. Mother and daughter started the business with a loan. They sell all sorts of products, including rice, sugar, oil, detergent, fruits and vegetables, meat, and ice-cream. Carmen works every day from 6am until 8pm, if not later. Mother and daughter work together. They have had the shop for 13 years and it allows them to have a decent life.

This loan will be used to stock up Carmen's shop further; she will buy staple goods with this loan. Carmen has been part of this group loan from 13 years and she likes it because, with it, she started her business. Carmen's dream is to continue expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy staple goods.

loans.name: Felicien

texts.en: Felicien is aged 52. He is married with four children aged between 22 and six years; all of them go to school. He is welding metals for building materials in his daily work. After getting a loan, he would like to buy more metals for welding. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To buy more metals for welding.

loans.name: Marie Louise

texts.en: Marie Louise is 37 years old. She is married and has two children (11 and 18), both of whom go to school. She sells clothes and has been running her business for the past 9 years. With this loan, she would like to buy more young children's clothes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy more young children's clothes to sell.

loans.name: Flerida Mercedes

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Nueva Esperanza se reúne cada quince días en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.
En este lugar vive la señora Flerida, tiene 59 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 8 hijos,  7 de ellos son mayores de edad y uno de 15 años que estudia en colegio y es el que aun vive con ellos. El marido es comerciante. 
Doña Flerida es una gran ama de casa que realiza el crédito para ayudarle a su esposo  el cual tiene un negocio de venta de frutas y legumbres, su esposo de madrugada se va a la ciudad de Portoviejo  a abastecerse en el mercado de mayoristas de todos los productos que el vende, luego se traslada al mercado de su localidad a vender sus productos a las personas que a diario acuden a este lugar, trabaja todos los días, lleva 15 años con este negocio con el cual se gana el sustento diario de su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar frutas y legumbres. Es socia fundadora del Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por los beneficios que brinda el Banco. Sus sueños son tener una tienda de víveres en su casa.
texts.en:
The "Nueva Esperanza" loan group meets every fortnight in the Picoaza parish of Portoviejo city. Picoaza is known very being an area that has a lot of trade. It is also known for the traditional "San Pedro" and San Pablo" festivals, and for the happy people who live here.

And it is here that 59-year-old Flerida lives. Flerida is married and has eight children, seven of whom are adults. The youngest is 15 years old, attending school and the only child still living at home. Flerida's husband is a businessman.

Flerida is a great housewife who is taking out this loan in order to help her husband, who has a business selling fruits and vegetables. Flerida's husband wakes up very early and goes to the city of Portoviejo to stock up at wholesale markets. He buys everything that he needs there and then heads to his local market to sell his goods to customers who come to him every day. Flerida's husband works every day. He has had the business for 15 years and uses it to support his family.

This loan will be used to buy fruits and vegetables. Flerida is a founding member of this loan group and likes it because of the benefits. Flerida's dream is to have a grocery store in her house.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Peruth

texts.en:
